Quest.Name: Variety is the Spice of Death
At War With The Scarlet Crusade

CustomBehavior.Text:
There is a problem moving char to quest

 Please move your char to: TIRISFAL GLADES
 and start bot.

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for i=0,4 do for j=1,GetContainerNumSlots(i)do l=GetContainerItemLink(i,j)if l then _,_,q=GetItemInfo(l)if q==0 or q==2 or q==3 then PickupContainerItem(i,j)PickupMerchantItem(0)end end end end
/run for i=0,4 do for j=1,GetContainerNumSlots(i)do l=GetContainerItemLink(i,j)if l then _,_,q=GetItemInfo(l)if q==0 or q==2 or q==3 then PickupContainerItem(i,j)DeleteCursorItem()end end end end
